meanings.sent1: The nonreactive substance remained unchanged when mixed with other chemicals.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed that the nonreactive solution did not produce any bubbles when combined with acid.
meanings.sent3: The nonreactive liquid was like a superhero, immune to the attacks of the villainous chemicals.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was as nonreactive as a still pond, undisturbed by the chaos around her.
meanings.sent5: The nonreactive metal seemed almost magical, resisting any attempts to alter its form.

meanings.definition: Not responsive or affected by external stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The nonreactive patient showed no signs of pain even when touched.
meanings.sent2: The cat remained nonreactive to the sound of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent3: Despite the loud music, he stayed nonreactive, lost in his own thoughts.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreactive attitude in the face of criticism was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The nonreactive rock stood still, unmoved by the raging river around it.

meanings.definition: Not participating in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent1: The nonreactive gas did not combine with any other elements in the container.
meanings.sent2: The nonreactive compound remained stable even under extreme heat.
meanings.sent3: The nonreactive element sat quietly on the periodic table, refusing to bond with others.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreactive behavior in the lab prevented any unexpected reactions.
meanings.sent5: The nonreactive solution acted like a silent observer, watching but not engaging in the chemical dance.
